Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents

Class MyShelfieGraphicIcon

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.MyShelfieGraphicIcon
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieComponent, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndGameTokenView, FirstPlayerSeatView, ScoringTokenView
public class MyShelfieGraphicIcon extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements MyShelfieComponent
The MyShelfieGraphicIcon class represents a graphical icon with "My Shelfie" style. It extends the JavaFX Pane class and implements the MyShelfieComponent interface.
Since:
08/06/2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

      public MyShelfieGraphicIcon(String iconFilePath, double padding)
      Creates a MyShelfieGraphicIcon with the specified icon file path and padding.
      Parameters:
      iconFilePath - the file path of the icon image
      padding - the padding to be applied to the icon

    • MyShelfieGraphicIcon

      Parameters:
      iconFilePath - the file path of the icon image
      padding - the padding to be applied to the icon
      roundEdgeType - the round edge type to be applied to the icon
      graphicSize - the graphic size to be applied to the icon

    • allowedGraphicSize

      private boolean allowedGraphicSize(String graphicSize)
      Verify if the background size chosen can be applied to the background image
      Parameters:
      graphicSize - the graphic size to be applied on the background image
      Returns:
      true if the graphic size of the image is allowed, false otherwise
